channel.title: Transparent pixels in site's logo
channel.description:
There are a few transparent pixels in the site's logo. (the one shown on a browser's tabs) This is unnoticeable on a white background, but for those with a dar theme, it makes the logo look weird.
Pictures: ![](upload://gPNxEaeKr1tk8QgwL7BqkrFBLN4.png)
icon ripped from the site: ![](upload://anfh7fWgWgdCnZon5oYvQhnX4sJ.png) the above pic with a pink background: ![](upload://rHKrK0zFZmsgnqKtkQKF2nqSY8f.png) and zoomed in: ![](upload://jic1k2dLvZf8iWTqr5tXcGtdOlP.png)
This was found in the [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13735']Black Mesa ARG thread[/url], and was suspected to be related to it, but it seems more likely that it was simply an oversight by whomever designed this part of the site.
